channel.title: G! Turbo! - Game Over! - The Blue Dragon, The Mercenary, The Mercenary and The Fool win!
channel.description:
# G! Turbo! - Wazza Edition ### Due to not enough classes yet. The thread for GI turbo is not yet being used. [Grand Idea FoL - Turbo Edition ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/grand-idea-fol-turbo-edition/75468/11). # Average Rules. * Game starts at [date=2019-03-30 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] * Days are 15 minutes. Twilight is 2 minutes. Nights are 5 minutes, unless I’m a failure and extend it. * Early day actions will be processed during the day, late day actions will be processed during Twilight, due to me being a failure once more. * There can be more than one King, but only a King election will take place once there are no Kings remaining. * I’m on PC, so don’t have mercy, feel free to make me want to die. * The amount of players are infinite but there must be at least 7 players. 1. ~~@Isaac_Gonzalez~~ - The Mercenary
2. @Soulshade55r 3. @CuteAlch 4. @anon97870008 5. ~~@Lightsin~~ - The Mercenary 6. @Emilia 7. @PoisonedSquid 8. @Kape 8. @GamerPoke 10. ~~@Boss110~~ The Devout King # There is no line for classes until the game begins. Classes will be watered down if they are not able to be used in Turbo, if classes can not work in turbo situations like this, they will be re-rolled. # There are two bastard mechanics selected by the host. One bastard mechanic is revealed to you: * All players flips will only flip their name.

> # The Mercenary
> Neutral Special
overmind (Passive) - you know everyones classes
nice (Passive) - no other class can affect you in any way
allies (Day) - change wincondition of target to (you win when H_Hjasik wins if he isnt in game you cant win) - Infinite uses
you win when H_Hjasik wins if he isnt in game you cant win

this in non-turbo
